name: sbcimi
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3
body: |- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w2, w3))

stmt.origin: bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w2, w3), wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w2, w3))
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wb(wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)), wi(w2, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w2, w3))
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wb(wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)), wi(w2, w3))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1))), wcel(c0, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w2, w3))
-| wb(wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)), wi(w2, w3))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1))))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w2, w3))
-| wb(wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)), wi(w2, w3))
-| wcel(c0, universe)

stmt.origin: imbi12i(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w2, w3)

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w1)), wi(w2, w3))
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w2)
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w2, w3))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w2)
-| wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), w3)

comment: Distribution of class substitution over implication, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 27-May-2019.)
